title: LoL Won't open HELP!!!
body:
everytime i click the icon on my desktop its logo appears and it would stay like that forever and when i click the logo "PVP.NET PATCHER KERNEL IS NOT RESPONDING" appears. please help me
thank you in advance

replies.body: Hey, this happened to me to!!!!!

Hello Axe253!

I'm really sorry that you are experiencing this error when attempting to start League of Legends!  There are a few different reasons as to why you would experience this error when you attempt to start the program.  One of them may be a corruption with the installation of the latest patch that is causing this issue to occur.  To that end, I strongly recommend that you complete all of the steps in the following Knowledge Base Article, which provides common solutions to this type of issue:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/21804747-Patcher-Problems

If you are still unable to open League of Legends normally, even after completing all of these steps, then please do not hesitate to let me know and I will be more than happy to further assist you!

I'm not 100% sure, but something similar happens to me sometimes and it will tell me that another instance of it is running. If I close it in the task manager and then open it again it usually works, but then again I am not sure if this is the same problem.
